actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A resolution to constitute the majority party's membership on certain committees for the One Hundred Nineteenth Congress, or until their successors are chosen.
subjects: Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry
Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
Senate Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship

summary.text: This resolution establishes the majority party's membership on the Committees on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry; Energy and Natural Resources; and Small Business and Entrepreneurship and the Special Committee on Aging.

titles.title: A resolution to constitute the majority party's membership on certain committees for the One Hundred Nineteenth Congress, or until their successors are chosen.
A resolution to constitute the majority party's membership on certain committees for the One Hundred Nineteenth Congress, or until their successors are chosen.
